Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a slightly burnished cream-coloured slip and with faint traces of two lines of thickly black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393195) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393195)
